item.title: 特朗普对清洁能源斗争的升级给生产商带来更多痛苦
item.description:
美国总统反对可再生能源的最新举措是取消对风力发电输电线路的拨款。【原文：

The US president’s latest move against renewables is to pull funding for transmission lines to carry wind power.

】

item.title: 互联网用户流失，利润不佳，Charter 股价暴跌
item.description: 宪章通信公司（Charter Communications Inc. 报告称，由于移动公司的 5G 和光纤家庭互联网产品带来的压力增大，该公司第二季度流失的互联网客户数量超过预期，导致该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Charter Communications Inc. shares tumbled after the company reported it lost more internet customers than expected during the second quarter amid increased pressure from mobile companies’ 5G and fiber home internet offerings.】

item.title: ComEd 首席执行官寻求制定规则防止人工智能推高能源账单
item.description: 芝加哥最大的能源供应商负责人呼吁制定新规则，以遏制人工智能热潮对消费者电费的影响。【原文：The head of Chicago’s biggest energy supplier has called for new rules to curb the impact of the artificial intelligence boom on consumers’ electricity bills.】

item.title: 运输沙特柴油的超级油轮驶向燃料短缺的欧洲
item.description: 一艘超级油轮正从中东运载柴油，前往燃料匮乏的欧洲市场，这反映出该地区的供应紧张。【原文：A supertanker carrying a cargo of diesel from the Middle East is en route to the fuel-starved European market, reflecting supply tightness in the region.】

item.title: 预算缺口目标缩减后加纳美元债券攀升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在加纳政府降低了 2025 年的预算赤字目标后，加纳的美元债券周五升至历史新高。【原文：Ghana’s dollar bonds rose to a record high on Friday after the government reduced its budget-deficit target for 2025.】

item.title: 人工智能竞争将一些人推向他们不愿涉足的领域
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，埃伦-休特（Ellen Huet）将探讨人工智能公司之间的竞争所带来的影响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet considers the effects of the competition for supremacy among artificial intelligence companies.】

item.title: 中国未能利用欧洲对美国关税的不满情绪
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注欧中关系。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at Europe-China ties. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: Meta 将停止在欧盟销售政治广告，理由是受到监管
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司将停止在欧盟销售政治和议题广告，理由是该公司认为新法规造成了 "难以承受的复杂性和法律不确定性"。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. will stop selling political and issue-focused advertising in the European Union, citing new regulations that the company believes creates “an untenable level of complexity and legal uncertainty.”】

item.title: 被困在不列颠哥伦比亚省纽蒙特矿山的矿工已获救
item.description: 不列颠哥伦比亚省伊斯库特（美联社）— 被困在加拿大西部一座金铜矿的三名工人在井下工作 60 多个小时后获救。【原文：ISKUT, British Columbia (AP) — Three workers who were trapped at a gold and copper mine in Western Canada have been rescued after more than 60 hours underground.】

item.title: Sarepta-Roche 基因疗法未能获得欧盟监管机构批准
item.description: 罗氏控股公司的基因疗法 Elevidys 未能获得欧洲监管机构的支持。【原文：Roche Holding AG’s gene therapy Elevidys failed to get the backing of European regulators.】

item.title: 埃拉拉称英国贸易协议将使印度国内生产总值提高四分之一个百分点
item.description: Elara Capital 公司称，印度与英国签署的自由贸易协定可在未来五年内将亚洲第三大经济体的增长速度提高四分之一个百分点。【原文：India’s free trade agreement with UK can boost growth for Asia’s third largest economy by a quarter point over the next five years, according to Elara Capital.】

item.title: 俄罗斯选择在经济降温之际将关键利率进一步下调至 18
item.description: 由于通胀放缓，人们越来越担心正在降温的经济可能会陷入衰退，俄罗斯央行将其关键利率降至近一年来的最低水平。【原文：Russia’s central bank slashed its key interest rate to the lowest level in nearly a year amid slowing inflation and growing worries the cooling economy could tip into recession.】

item.title: 在 Des Dorides 辞职后，Nayara 任命了新的首席执行官
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，继亚历山德罗-德斯-多里德斯（Alessandro des Dorides）上周辞职后，俄罗斯巨头罗斯涅夫特石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）部分持股、最近受到欧盟制裁打击的纳亚拉能源有限公司（Nayara Energy Ltd.）已任命了新的首席执行官。【原文：Nayara Energy Ltd., a company partially owned by Russian giant Rosneft PJSC and recently hit by EU sanctions, has appointed a new chief executive officer following the resignation of Alessandro des Dorides last week, according to people familiar with the development.】

item.title: 中国的 Unitree 公司推出售价不到 6000 美元的仿人机器人
item.description: Unitree Robotics 公司正在销售世界上首批售价低于 6000 美元的仿人机器人之一，大大降低了入门价格，预计这将发展成为工作场所和家庭的一大波多功能人工智能机器。【原文：Unitree Robotics is marketing one of the world’s first humanoid robots for under $6,000, drastically reducing the entry price for what’s expected to grow into a whole wave of versatile AI machines for the workplace and home.】

item.title: 空中客车公司机翼工厂工人就薪酬问题举行罢工投票
item.description: 英国 3000 多名空中客车公司工人投票决定举行罢工，原因是这家飞机制造商提出的薪资待遇被他们称为不够合理。【原文：More than 3,000 Airbus SE workers in the UK have voted to go on strike over a pay offer from the aircraft manufacturer they have described as inadequate.】

item.title: 财报为股市进一步上涨提供了理由
item.description:
公司以四年来最快的速度超出预期。【原文：

Companies are beating estimates at the fastest pace in four years.

】

item.title: 印尼法院判处梅加瓦蒂助手有罪，对反对党造成打击
item.description: 印度尼西亚一家法院在一起腐败案中判定前总统梅加瓦蒂-苏加诺普特丽的一名高级助手有罪，对该国主要反对党的领导层造成了打击。【原文：An Indonesian court convicted a senior aide to former President Megawati Soekarnoputri in a corruption case, dealing a blow to the leadership of the nation’s main opposition party.】

item.title: DayOne 称，特朗普的人工智能计划将推动亚洲数据中心项目的发展
item.description: 一位新加坡的行业高管表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周公布的人工智能行动计划将成为亚洲数据中心项目的积极推动力。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s AI Action Plan unveiled this week is set to be a positive driver for data center projects in Asia, a Singapore-based industry executive said.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数嗡嗡作响的利润引擎将继续推动股市反弹
item.description: 一个稳健的财报季显示，美国企业的利润引擎正在嗡嗡作响，这有可能缓解人们对美股创纪录的涨势开始过热的担忧。【原文：A solid earnings season shows Corporate America’s profit engine is humming along, potentially easing worries that the record-setting rally in US stocks is starting to overheat.】

item.title: 刚果将钴价作为促进当地加工业发展的目标
item.description: 据刚果民主共和国国营矿业公司董事长称，政府正在考虑下一步措施，在禁止出口电池金属之后，刚果民主共和国正在寻求一个鼓励国内加工的钴价。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo is seeking a cobalt price that encourages domestic processing, as the government considers its next steps to follow a ban on exports of the battery metal, according to the chairman of the state mining company.】

item.title: BC Partners 面临 60 亿欧元媒体公司经理人的不满
item.description: 在另类资产管理公司 BC Partners LLP 解雇了欧洲大型电信和媒体公司 United Group BV 的创始人兼首席执行官之后，该公司的高层管理者与私募股权所有者之间出现了裂痕。【原文：A rift is opening between top managers at United Group BV, a sprawling European telecom and media firm, and private equity owner BC Partners LLP after the alternative asset manager fired the company’s founder and chief executive officer.】

item.title: Rightmove 称，英国住房存量增加对房屋开发商造成损害
item.description: 英国房地产门户网站 Rightmove Plc 称，英国的可用住房存量创下了 10 年来的新高，形成了买方市场，给新房开发商带来了压力。【原文：UK property portal Rightmove Plc said available housing stock in Britain is at a 10-year high, creating a buyer’s market and putting pressure on new home developers.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利在里拉汇率创下历史新高之际推出拥挤的里拉交易旗帜
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）建议对土耳其里拉采取更加谨慎的态度，理由是货币贬值速度加快，利差交易中的定位越来越拥挤，即使该货币继续产生实际正收益。【原文：Morgan Stanley is advising a more cautious approach to the Turkish lira, citing a faster pace of currency depreciation and increasingly crowded positioning in the carry trade, even as the currency continues to generate positive returns in real terms.】

item.title: 中国为抵消关税突击花钱，预算缺口创历史新高
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税减少了对美国的出口，中国上半年的预算赤字攀升至创纪录的新高，凸显了政府为支撑国内需求而加大的努力。【原文：China’s budget deficit climbed to a fresh record in the first half, highlighting intensified government efforts to shore up domestic demand as Donald Trump’s tariffs reduce exports to the US.】

item.title: 泰柬冲突对贸易和旅游业造成的风险暂时有限
item.description: 泰国和柬埔寨之间的武装军事冲突目前对大多数商业部门造成的风险有限，而旅游业专家正在采取观望态度以评估其影响。【原文：The armed military conflict between Thailand and Cambodia presents limited risks to most business sectors for now while tourism industry experts are taking a wait-and-see stance to assess the impact.】

item.title: 起亚重塑美国销售战略，因关税问题削减激励措施
item.description: 起亚公司将调整其在美国的业务运营，并削减针对零售客户的激励措施，与全球汽车制造商一道努力减轻美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收进口关税的影响。【原文：Kia Corp. will adjust its business operations in the US and cut incentives for retail customers, joining carmakers globally in trying to mitigate the fallout of President Donald Trump’s import tariffs.】

item.title: 日本新闻应用程序运营商 SmartNews 据称将为 IPO 聘请银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本新闻聚合应用程序运营商 SmartNews Inc.【原文：Japan’s news aggregation app operator SmartNews Inc. has hired banks for its initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行哈特内特再次警告股市存在泡沫风险
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师表示，随着货币政策的放松以及金融监管的放松，股市出现泡沫的风险正在上升。【原文：The risk of a bubble in stock markets is rising as monetary policy loosens alongside an easing in financial regulation, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 汤姆-海耶斯获胜后，四名因操纵汇率入狱的交易商将提起上诉
item.description: 本周，英国最高法院推翻了对汤姆-海耶斯（Tom Hayes）的定罪，四名交易员将对他们因操纵基准利率而入狱的判决提出上诉。【原文：A group of four traders will appeal convictions that saw them jailed for fixing benchmark interest rates, after the UK Supreme Court overturned the conviction of Tom Hayes this week.】

item.title: 欧盟与美国向贸易协议迈进，德国商业前景趋于乐观
item.description: 第三季度伊始，德国企业的信心略有增强，因为欧洲和美国更接近于达成贸易协议，而且德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔兹（Friedrich Merz）誓言将经济作为其首要任务。【原文：Confidence among German businesses improved slightly at the start of third quarter as Europe and the US moved closer to a trade deal and Chancellor Friedrich Merz vowed to make the economy his No. 1 priority.】
